review: I've used this for several months now and I think four stars is a fair rating.  It works well most of the time, but sometimes it seems to get "stuck" when trying to use it after it goes to sleep.  When that happens I'm forced to unplug it and plug it back into the HDMI slot to get it to wake up.  Other than that, it's very responsive and works fine.  I'm pretty happy with it, lockups notwithstanding.
